Getting Started¶

easy_install¶

you can just run:

sudo easy_install oclpb

Prerequisites¶

Only OpenCL!

Download¶

  • Download from stable version from PyPi
  • Or Download the latest from GitHub

Build¶

run:

python setup.py build
python setup.py install [ --prefix=$SOMPATH ]

Test¶

run:

python -m unittest discover opencl/
